# SKProductDiscount.Type.introductory

**Case**

A constant indicating the discount type is an introductory offer.

## Declaration

```swift
case introductory
```

## Discussion

For more information, see [doc://com.apple.storekit/documentation/StoreKit/implementing-introductory-offers-in-your-app].

## Types of Offers

- **SKProductDiscount.Type.subscription**: A constant indicating the discount type is a promotional offer.
